ED_Title: Provisional programme of work and timetable of the First Committee for 2018
ED_DecisionText:
At its 62nd plenary meeting, on 4 December 2017, the General Assembly, on the recommendation of the First Committee,  approved the provisional programme of work and timetable of the Committee for 2017, as set out in the annex to the report of the Committee. 


(See A/72/478; A/72/PV.62)
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/72/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
